QuestData.Title: The Jig is Up
QuestData.Description: I know why you're here, $n. You've been sent to kill our leader, Jonah Sterling.$B$BI'd like to offer my help. Jonah's leadership threatens our operation.$B$BAttacking the Horde and the Alliance fleets simultaneously? Suicidal. Trying to sell the tuskarr as slaves when they die days after leaving this climate? Disastrous.$B$BJonah's hideout is located inside a cave west of here. Bring me his spyglass as proof of the deed and my first action as leader will be to end all attacks against your allies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Annie Bonn at Scalawag Point wants you to bring her Jonah Sterling's Spyglass.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, $n. Did you get Jonah's spyglass?$B$BI can't just take your word for the assassination, you know? I am a pirate after all.
QuestData.RewardText: Jonah Sterling's days are finally over! He never thought this "wench" would make it.$B$BAs word of Jonah's death spreads among the pirates I will consolidate my leadership. Your allies won't get any more trouble from my crew, $n.
